name: v0.13.1
body:
This release is not a substantial one.
This release includes a patch to failing doc build.
https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/885

name: v0.13.0
body:
This release only supports Chainer v6 and not Chainer v5.
For those users using Chainer v5, please update the version of Chainer or use ChainerCV v0.13.

**Features**
- add MaskRCNN [\#781](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/781)
- DeepLabV3+ [\#757](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/757) (Thank you [69guitar1015](https://github.com/69guitar1015))


**No Compat Changes**

- FPN related implementation changed (e.g. `head.py` is renamed to `bbox_head.py`) [\#781](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/781)
- When `chainercv.global_config.cv_read_image_backend == 'cv2'`, ChainerCV is changed to raise error when `cv2` is not installed. [\#852](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/852)
- Point data format has changed from `(K, 2)` to `[(K, 2)]`
  - change interface of point/transforms [\#808](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/808)
  - Change interface of vis\_point [\#809](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/809)
- Requires name as key for SlicableDataset [\#833](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/833)

**New CI**

We upgraded our CI to pfnCI (PFN’s in-house CI system). Now GPU tests and example tests run ([related](https://twitter.com/ChainerOfficial/status/1119086389256052736))
- pfnCI (pytests) [\#823](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/823)
- pfnCI \(examples tests\) [\#842](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/842) 
- Enable model cache in pfnCI [\#882](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/882) 
- pfnCI on CuPy repository [\#865](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/865) 
- pfnCI on Chainer repository [\#854](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/854) 
- Include dockerfile for PFN CI and add tests with chainer master [\#848](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/848) 

**Enhancements**

- Support Chainer-style initialization in TransformDataset [\#832](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/832)
- add arg --dataset in examples demo [\#877](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/877) (Thank you [knorth55](https://github.com/knorth55))
- refactor eval\_semantic\_segmentation [\#875](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/875) (Thank you [knorth55](https://github.com/knorth55))
- refactor eval\_imagenet.py [\#874](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/874) (Thank you [knorth55](https://github.com/knorth55))
- refactor eval codes [\#871](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/871) (Thank you [knorth55](https://github.com/knorth55))
- Support MN mode for evaluators [\#868](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/868) ([yuyu2172](https://github.com/yuyu2172))
- DetectionVisReport save tight figure [\#863](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/863) (Thank you [23pointsNorth](https://github.com/23pointsNorth))
- use pure\_nccl in examples/ [\#845](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/845) (Thank you [knorth55](https://github.com/knorth55))
- add fcis examples\_tests [\#840](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/840) (Thank you [knorth55](https://github.com/knorth55))
- Create .lock directory [\#839](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/839)
- Add argument of `alpha` to `MixUpSoftLabelDataset` [\#836](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/836) (Thank you [crcrpar](https://github.com/crcrpar))
- Change links to override forward [\#835](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/835) (Thank you [crcrpar](https://github.com/crcrpar))
- FPN - Add min/max size params for pre-processing. [\#830](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/830) (Thank you [23pointsNorth](https://github.com/23pointsNorth))
- Support file-like object in image I/O [\#824](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/824) 
- add left time in progress hook [\#817](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/817) (Thank you [knorth55](https://github.com/knorth55))
- Show the cause of ValueError [\#814](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/814) (Thank you [ktns](https://github.com/ktns))
- args --batch-size -\> --batchsize in examples [\#811](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/811) (Thank you [knorth55](https://github.com/knorth55))
- change assert\_is\_point, assert\_is\_point\_dataset, CUB datasets [\#806](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/806)
- Change doc style of eval\_\* [\#804](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/804) 
- Change doc style of vis\_\* [\#803](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/803) 
- add sort\_by\_score in vis\_bbox [\#801](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/801) (Thank you [knorth55](https://github.com/knorth55))
- add scale\_mask [\#799](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/799) 
- rename psroi\_pooling -\> ps\_roi\_average\_pooling and refactor [\#795](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/795) (Thank you [knorth55](https://github.com/knorth55))
- make mask\_to\_bbox not copy to CPU [\#792](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/792) 
- add eval\_instance\_segmentation\_multi.py [\#789](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/789) (Thank you [knorth55](https://github.com/knorth55))
- Lock dataset directory before extraction [\#788](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/788) 
- Unify eval detection [\#786](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/786) 
- use scales in faster\_rcnn\_tests [\#783](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/783) (Thank you [knorth55](https://github.com/knorth55))
- simplify coco instance datasets [\#778](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/778) 
- add sort\_by\_score option to vis\_instance\_segmentation [\#777](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/777) 
- set n\_gpu \* 0.0005 as fcis lr default [\#776](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/776) (Thank you [knorth55](https://github.com/knorth55))
- Fix a typo [\#864](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/864) (Thank you [mitmul](https://github.com/mitmul))
- Change the condition in `mask\_to\_segm\(\)` to eliminate invalid bboxes [\#860](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/860) (Thank you [mitmul](https://github.com/mitmul))
- Use with block instead of setting global config [\#857](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/857) 
- Set allow\_pickle=True [\#853](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/853) 
- fix typo [\#851](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/851) (Thank you [okdshin](https://github.com/okdshin))
- Fix SSD train\_multi.py [\#844](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/844) 
- fix missing link in doc [\#834](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/834) 
- Fix ImageNet example [\#831](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/831) (Thank you [keisukefukuda](https://github.com/keisukefukuda))
- Fix inference configuration on ADE20K in DeepLab [\#826](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/826) (Thank you [69guitar1015](https://github.com/69guitar1015))
- Add link to deeplab page in document [\#805](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/805) 
- fix resize when 0 length image is given [\#798](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/798) 
- fix eval\_instance\_segmentation\_coco when `pred\_masks` is empty [\#780](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/780) 
- Prevent mutating input of FeaturePredictor.prepare [\#779](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/779) 
- add test\_xception.py [\#879](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/879) (Thank you [knorth55](https://github.com/knorth55))
- update semantic\_segmentation/README.md [\#878](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/878) (Thank you [knorth55](https://github.com/knorth55))
- Update readme [\#872](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/872) (Thank you [knorth55](https://github.com/knorth55))
- Update to Chainer 6.0 [\#867](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/867) 
- use - instead of \_ [\#866](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/866) 
- fix instance\_segmentation readme [\#862](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/862) (Thank you [knorth55](https://github.com/knorth55))
- Make Travis CI smaller [\#855](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/855) 
- Use Ours and Original when reporting performance [\#846](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/846) 
- update readme [\#837](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/837) (Thank you [knorth55](https://github.com/knorth55))
- Add deeplab pretrained test [\#827](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/827) (Thank you [69guitar1015](https://github.com/69guitar1015))
- Fix README [\#822](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/822) (Thank you [Hakuyume](https://github.com/Hakuyume))
- Fix docstring of DirectoryParsingLabelDataset [\#820](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/820) (Thank you [iwiwi](https://github.com/iwiwi))
- Fix typo: Citåyscapes -\> Cityscapes [\#813](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/813) (Thank you [soskek](https://github.com/soskek))
- Use table for the documentation of bbox transforms [\#807](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/807) 
- add PS RoI Max Pooling [\#797](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/797) (Thank you [knorth55](https://github.com/knorth55))
- add PS RoI max/average align [\#796](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/796) (Thank you [knorth55](https://github.com/knorth55))
- cache conda for travis build [\#791](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/791) (Thank you [knorth55](https://github.com/knorth55))
- Add chainermn support to apply\_to\_iterator [\#785](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/785) 
- test FCISResNet101 loss [\#784](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/784) (Thank you [knorth55](https://github.com/knorth55))

name: v0.12.0
body:
**Spotlight**
- Feature Pyramid Networks [\#685](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/685)
- Add ResNet training code [\#436](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/436)
- Add training part of PSPNet [\#634](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/634)
- Add FCIS coco demo, training and evaluation [\#724](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/724) (Thank you [knorth55](https://github.com/knorth55)!)
- Add YOLOv2 tiny [\#711](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/711)

**New Features**
- Add COCOSemanticSegmentationDataset [\#736](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/736)
- Add interpolation and fill options to rotate [\#739](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/739) 
- Add make\_shift [\#726](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/726)

**API change**
- change range of labels for ADE20K [\#743](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/743)


**Enhancement**
- Enable cv2/InfiniBand hack [\#769](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/769)
- Perform batch size check before converting scales [\#762](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/762) (Thank you [23pointsNorth](https://github.com/23pointsNorth)!)
- Unify evaluation for semantic segmentation [\#749](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/749)
- Use PIL and cv2 for rotate [\#740](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/740)
- use scales \(tuple of floats\) in region\_proposal\_network [\#729](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/729) (Thank you [knorth55](https://github.com/knorth55)!)
- Remove version specification of OpenCV [\#728](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/728)
- raise error when year=2017 and split in \[minival, valminusminival\] [\#725](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/725) (Thank you [knorth55](https://github.com/knorth55)!)
- use cupy.RawKernel in non\_maximum\_suppression [\#723](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/723) (Thank you [knorth55](https://github.com/knorth55)!)
- Use f.convert\('L'\) to read grayscale in read\_image\(\) [\#695](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/695) (Thank you [69guitar1015](https://github.com/69guitar1015)!)
- Fix PickableSequentialChain.copy\(\) [\#764](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/764) (Thank you [ktns](https://github.com/ktns)!)
- Fix docstring of `ProposalTargetCreator` [\#758](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/758) (Thank you [nai62](https://github.com/nai62)!)
- return empty bbox when input mask is empty in mask\_to\_bbox [\#754](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/754) (Thank you [knorth55](https://github.com/knorth55)!)
- fix typo in mxnet2npz.py script [\#752](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/752) (Thank you [knorth55](https://github.com/knorth55)!)
- Fix resnet50 fb url [\#751](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/751) (Thank you [knorth55](https://github.com/knorth55)!)
- Fix VOCSemanticSegmentationDataset bug with cv2 [\#746](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/746)
- Stop extracting dataset when ADE20k is extracted already [\#745](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/745)
- Return rgb when rgba is loaded [\#734](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/734)
- Update README for FPN [\#771](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/771)
- doc source link to github source page [\#768](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/768) (Thank you [knorth55](https://github.com/knorth55)!)
- Fix rst of YOLO [\#767](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/767)
- Add `truncated\_index` into params of crop\_bbox [\#761](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/761) (Thank you [ktns](https://github.com/ktns)!)
- Fix typo in SSD's test\_train\_multi.sh [\#760](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/760)
- remove use\_pretrained\_class\_weights [\#755](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/755)
- Refactor PSPNet, support Res50 backbone and ImageNet pretrained weights [\#748](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/748)
- Use chainer.global\_config in doc [\#742](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/742) 
- add table in COCOInstanceSegmentationDataset [\#741](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/741) (Thank you [knorth55](https://github.com/knorth55)!)
- fix typo in transforms/image/resize\_contain.py [\#733](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/733) (Thank you [knorth55](https://github.com/knorth55))
- Fix typo in transforms/image [\#732](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/732) (Thank you [takaaki82](https://github.com/takaaki82)!)
- Fix typo in links connection [\#731](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/731) (Thank you [takaaki82](https://github.com/takaaki82)!)
- Fix README [\#722](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/722)
- fix typo, 'bounding box' [\#721](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/721) (Thank you [disktnk](https://github.com/disktnk)!)
- Fix doc of TupleDataset [\#720](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/720) 
- Make backends of read\_image and resize selectable [\#713](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/713)
- Add examples tests [\#708](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/708)

name: v0.11.0
body:
This release only supports Chainer v5 and not Chainer v4.
For those users using Chainer v4, please update the version of Chainer or use ChainerCV v0.10.

**Spotlight**
- Add FCIS training [link](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/tree/master/examples/fcis)  [\#620](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/620) (Thank you [knorth55](https://github.com/knorth55)!)
- Implement SE-ResNeXt. [\#659](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/659) (Thank you [g-votte](https://github.com/g-votte)!)
- Implement SE-ResNet [\#655](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/655) (Thank you [g-votte](https://github.com/g-votte)!)

**New Featrues**
- add InstanceSegmentationCOCOEvaluator  [\#674](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/674) (Thank you [knorth55](https://github.com/knorth55)!)
- Add COCO instance segmentation evaluation [\#671](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/671) (Thank you [knorth55](https://github.com/knorth55)!)
- Add COCO Instance segmentation dataset [\#665](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/665) (Thank you [knorth55](https://github.com/knorth55)!)
- Add DetectionCOCOEvaluator [\#648](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/648) 
- Add COCOBboxDataset [\#453](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/453) 
- Add eval\_detection\_coco [\#456](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/456) 
- add rotate\_bbox [\#692](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/692) (Thank you [knorth55](https://github.com/knorth55)!)
- add rotate transforms for image [\#690](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/690) (Thank you [knorth55](https://github.com/knorth55)!)

**API Change**
- The order of the arguments of `resize_contain` changed [\#660](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/660)

**Implemented Enhancements**

-  Remove angle range in `rotate_bbox` and `rotate` [#699](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/699) (Thank you [knorth55](https://github.com/knorth55)!)
- fix travis with Chainerv5 [#717](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/717)
- Fix failing CUB tests [#716](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/716)
- Release objects in tests [#703](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/703)
- Use return_indices in SegNet[#704](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/704)
- allreduce -> allreduce_obj [#705](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/705)
- nosetests -> pytest [#706](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/706)
-  add run_module [#707](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/707)
-  Fix installation of pycocotools [#709](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/709)
-  Fix division in eval_cityscapes_multi.py [#710](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/710)
-  fix failing flake8 [#712](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/712)
- fix doc badge link [#700](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/700) (Thank you [knorth55](https://github.com/knorth55)!)
- Fix DeprecationWarning [#702](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/702) (Thank you [ktns](https://github.com/ktns)!)
- make mask_to_bbox support all False mask [#701](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/701)
-  Use COCO2017 [\#694](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/694) 
- refine transforms\_tests/bbox\_tests [\#689](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/689) (Thank you [knorth55](https://github.com/knorth55)!)
- assert flip image ndim == 3 [\#688](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/688) (Thank you [knorth55](https://github.com/knorth55)!)
- Refactor FCIS codes [\#672](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/672) (Thank you [knorth55](https://github.com/knorth55)!)
- Fix doc and style of SEResNet [\#656](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/656)
- Use unittest.skipUnless [\#641](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/641) 
- Support bool in SliceableDataset [\#638](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/638)
- Fix coco instance dataset test [\#687](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/687) (Thank you [knorth55](https://github.com/knorth55)!)
- use kwargs for ResBlock in pspnet [\#686](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/686) (Thank you [knorth55](https://github.com/knorth55)!)
- fix cocoapi repo in .travis.yml [\#675](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/675) (Thank you [knorth55](https://github.com/knorth55)!)
- fix typo in examples/fcis/README.md [\#658](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/658) (Thank you [knorth55](https://github.com/knorth55)!)
- weight -\> width in README [\#657](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/657)
- fix ssd.multibox\_loss with comm [\#654](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/654)
- Do not use lambdas for add\_getter [\#652](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/652)
- Fix downloading COCO data [\#650](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/650)
- Use http in OnlineProductsDataset [\#649](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/649)
- fix eval\_detection\_coco to work when classes are missing [\#647](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/647)
- Fix typo in COCOBBoxDataset [\#639](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/639)
- deprecate random\_rotate [\#693](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/693)
- Fix typo in caffe2npz.py [\#678](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/678)
- Add Mxnet model to Chainer convert script for FCIS [\#664](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/664) (Thank you [knorth55](https://github.com/knorth55)!)
- Fix doc of eval\_detection\_coco [\#645](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/645) 
- Add Ogawa as author [\#642](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/642) 
- fix typo in faster\_rcnn\_train\_chain [\#640](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/640) (Thank you [knorth55](https://github.com/knorth55)!)
- Change assert\_is\_bbox\_dataset to pass with zero-sized bbox [\#452](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/452) 
- Check that zero-sized bounding box can be generated by generate\_random\_bbox [\#451](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/451) 
- Check that assert\_is\_bbox passes 0 sized bbox [\#450](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/450) 
- Add a test for OnlineProductsDataset [\#400](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/400)

name: v0.10.0
body:
This release only supports ChainerMN v1.3.

**Spotlight Feature**

We added various algorithms.

- Inference code of FCIS ResNet101 [\#568](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/568) (Thank you [knorth55](https://github.com/knorth55) !)
- Inference code of YOLOv3 [\#586](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/586)
- Inference code of YOLOv2 [\#586](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/595)
- Inference code of PSPNet [\#610](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/610)

We wrote our license term more explicitly (check [here](https://chainercv.readthedocs.io/en/latest/license.html)). 

- Note pretrained models' license  [\#631](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/631)

We use AWS to host pretrained weights

- Use official hosting [\#633](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/633)

**API Changes**

- Stop using `nobias=False` for ResNet101 and ResNet152 with the He architecture [\#621](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/621)

**New Features**

- multi GPU evaluation of semantic segmentation [\#629](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/629)

**New tutorials**

- Add fine-tuning tutorial ([\#601](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/601), [tutorial](https://chainercv.readthedocs.io/en/latest/tutorial/link.html))

**Implemented enhancements:**

- ChainerMN 1.3 [\#619](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/619) 
- Use loc, obj, conf in YOLO [\#618](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/618) 
- use --foo-bar style in argparse [\#617](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/617) 
- args --pretrained\_model -\> --pretrained-model [\#616](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/616) (Thank you [knorth55](https://github.com/knorth55)!)
- fix typo in examples/instance\_segmentation/eval\_sbd.py [\#615](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/615) (Thank you [knorth55](https://github.com/knorth55)!)
- Chainer 5.0.0b1 [\#614](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/614) 
- run\_module missing in test\_fcis\_resnet101 [\#611](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/611)
- add instance segmentation voc evaluator extensions [\#609](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/609) (Thank you [knorth55](https://github.com/knorth55)!)
- update fcis variable names [\#608](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/608) (Thank you [knorth55](https://github.com/knorth55)!)
- Simplify mask voting [\#607](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/607)
- Delete unnecessary assignment in ProposalCreator [\#604](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/604) (Thank you [t2kasa](https://github.com/t2kasa)!)
- Improve pretrained tests [\#599](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/599)
- Delete attr.disk [\#598](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/598)
- misc fix for YOLOv3 [\#593](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/593)
- add prepare\_pretrained\_model [\#591](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/591)
- update fcis variables names [\#587](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/587) (Thank you [knorth55](https://github.com/knorth55)!)
- Use `prob` more strictly inside SSD and Faster R-CNN [\#584](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/584)
- add more badges in README [\#581](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/581) (Thank you [knorth55](https://github.com/knorth55)!)
- Add exclude option to style\_checker.py [\#441](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/441)
- Fix bbox\_to\_mask to return np.float32 [\#625](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/625) (Thank you [knorth55](https://github.com/knorth55)!)
- add prob clipping for mask\_voting [\#606](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/606) (Thank you [knorth55](https://github.com/knorth55)!)
- Fix hacking version [\#597](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/597)
- Let YOLOv3.predict accept input image other than float32 [\#594](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/594) (Thank you [ronekko](https://github.com/ronekko)!)
- Add FCIS to README [\#632](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/632)
- Add PSPNet to README [\#630](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/630)
- Fix pickle issue in train\_multi.py in SSD [\#623](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/623)
- Add YOLO to README [\#590](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/590)
- str --\> string [\#583](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/583)

name: v0.9.0
body:
This release only supports Chainer v4 and not Chainer v3.
For those users using Chainer v3, please update the version of Chainer or use ChainerCV v0.8.

**Spotlight Feature**

- Slicable datasets (`chainercv.chainer_experimental.datasets.slicable`, [tutorial](http://chainercv.readthedocs.io/en/latest/tutorial/sliceable.html)). All dataset classes in ChainerCV support the functionality.

**API Changes**

We renamed APIs relating to points.
- Change name to CUBPointDataset and add tests [\#528](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/528)
- Change naming conventions in transforms for points [\#526](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/526)
- vis\_keypoint --\> vis\_point [\#525](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/525)

Some public attributes of datasets have been changed
- Use SliceableDataset [\#457](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/457)

We improved and renamed the method apply\_to\_iteartor
- apply\_prediction\_to\_iterator --> apply\_to\_iterator [\#523](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/523)

We changed the interface of vis\_semantic\_segmentation to be consistent with the rest of the visualizers.
- Change vis_semantic_segmentation to take image [\#576](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/576)



**New Features**
- Add SliceableDataset [\#454](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/454), (Check the [tutorial](http://chainercv.readthedocs.io/en/latest/tutorial/sliceable.html)!)
- SSD train example with multiple GPUs [\#504](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/504)  (Check [the training script](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/blob/master/examples/ssd/train_multi.py)!)
- Add ResNet [\#321](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/321)
- Add SiameseDataset [\#505](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/505)
- Support MixUpSoftLabelDataset. [\#497](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/497) (thank you [fukatani](https://github.com/fukatani)!)
- Add random\_size\_crop [\#432](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/432)

Utilities for Instance Segmentation
- add VOC instance segmentation evaluation  [\#554](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/554) (thank you [knorth55](https://github.com/knorth55))
- Add vis instance segmentation func [\#541](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/541) (thank you [knorth55](https://github.com/knorth55))
- Add VOC and SBD instance segmentation dataset [\#540](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/540) (thank you [knorth55](https://github.com/knorth55))
- add mask\_iou [\#552](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/552) (thank you [knorth55](https://github.com/knorth55))
- Add PSROIPooling Function [\#545](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/545) (thank you [knorth55](https://github.com/knorth55))


**Implemented enhancements:**
- fix _check_available in SBDInstanceSegmentationDataset [\#577](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/577)
- plot --\> plt [\#574](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/574)
- Change the author email address [\#573](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/573)
- Chainer 4.0.0 [\#572](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/572) 
- Support keys assign in GetterDataset [\#571](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/571) 
- remove \_chainermn\_available [\#563](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/563)
- Make dataset dependent part clear for SegNet example [\#557](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/557)
- Change InstanceSegmentationDataset interface [\#555](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/555)
- Add dilate and bn\_kwargs to Bottleneck and ResBlock [\#549](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/549)
- Update interface of vis\_instance\_segmentation and add color option [\#546](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/546)
- Do not use vis\_image in vis\_instance\_segmentation [\#544](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/544)
- Support None option for activ [\#529](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/529)
- Add assert\_is\_point [\#524](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/524)
- list\(\)/dict\(\) -\> \[\]/{} [\#522](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/522)
- Allow padding to be different in y and x directions for tile\_images [\#512](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/512)
- fix test\_assert\_is\_point [\#566](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/566)
- Fix ade\_label\_names and ade\_label\_colors [\#556](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/556)
- Fix build scripts not to include binary files and .pyx files [\#550](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/550) (thank you [gwtnb](https://github.com/gwtnb))
- Fix ResNets when initialW is specified [\#548](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/548)
- Fix the range of offset in random\_crop [\#534](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/534) (thank you [akitotakeki](https://github.com/akitotakeki))
- Fix pretrained weight for ResNet [\#533](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/533) 
- Dynamically import matplotlib.pyplot [\#519](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/519)
- Fix a test failure due to a rounding error [\#513](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/513)
- Support list in sliceable datasets [\#575](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/575)
- Improve sliceable tutorial [\#570](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/570)
- bach -\> batch [\#565](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/565)
- Support using vis\_bbox together with vis\_instance\_segmentation   [\#560](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/560)
- update LICENSE [\#551](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/551) (thank you [knorth55](https://github.com/knorth55))
- fix doc [\#542](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/542) (thank you [fukatani](https://github.com/fukatani))
- Add a simple example for SiameseDataset [\#531](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/531)
- add tuple check to style\_checker [\#530](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/530)
- Add assert\_is\_point\_dataset [\#527](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/527)
- Fix typos in detection tutorial [\#515](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/515)
- Fix example code in a detection tutorial [\#514](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/514) (thank you [koki0702](https://github.com/koki0702))
- Add dilate option and MultiNodeBatchNormalization to Conv2DActiv and Conv2DBNActiv [\#494](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/494)

name: v0.8.0
body:
This release only supports Chainer v3 and not Chainer v2.
For those users using Chainer v2, please update the version of Chainer or use ChainerCV v0.7.

**API Changes**
- The default value of option `data_dir` for CityscapesDataset has changed from `None` to `'auto'`. [\#448](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/448) 

**New Features**
- Add ProgressHook [\#473](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/473) 
- Add CityscapesTestImageDataset [\#440](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/440) 

**New Tutorial**
- Add a tutorial on Object Detection [\#434](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/434) 

**Enhancements and Bug Fixes**

- Test Chainer 3.2.0 on Travis [\#499](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/499)
- Use ProgressHook in segnet [\#498](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/498)
- Improve reference of tutorial [\#479](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/479)
- Fix doc of download to refer to chainer.dataset.download properly [\#478](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/478)
- Improve appearence of y\_offset and x\_offset in doc [\#475](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/475) 
- Use 'data' as an attribute for BlobProto for SSD [\#491](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/491)
- Retruns -\> Returns [\#483](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/483) 
- Fix flip\_keypoint to accept keypoints on the edge [\#481](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/481)
- Fix grammatical mistakes in doc [\#477](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/477)
- Fix refs to NMS in SSD doc [\#476](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/476)
- Fix doc of crop\_bbox [\#474](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/474) 
- Fix variable names of eval\_imagenet [\#472](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/472)
- Fix datasets docs [\#464](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/464)
- fix bbox format in flip\_bbox [\#458](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/458) (Thank you @knorth55)
- Add testing.run\_module to eval\_detection\_voc [\#455](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/455) 
- Fix doc of bbox2loc and loc2bbox [\#439](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/439) 
- Add attr.disk [\#493](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/493)
- Use math notations for bounding box coordinates [\#485](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/485)
- Improve reference links [\#482](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/482)
- Fix documentation of SegNet [\#471](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/471)
- Improve the top page of the documentation [\#470](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/470)
- Fix letter case in README [\#469](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/469)
- Improve code examples of detection.rst [\#467](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/467) 
- Fix datasets docs [\#466](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/466)
- Simplify README [\#465](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/465)
- fix setting parameters of random\_distort [\#461](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/461) (thank you @peisuke)
- avoid zero division in bbox2loc [\#459](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/459) (thank you @knorth55)
- Fix doc of Conv2DBNActiv [\#447](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/447)
- Chainer 3.0.0 [\#445](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/445)

name: v0.7.0
body:
This release is targeted at Chainer v2.

**Major Improvements**
- We added an evaluation script for ImageNet trained models [(link)](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/tree/master/examples/classification).

**API Changes**
- `CUBLabelDataset` and `CUBKeypointDataset`
     - Add `return_prob_map` option to CUBDataset and delete `return_mask` option [\#443](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/443) 
     - Add `return_bb` option to CUBDatasets and delete `crop_bbox` option [\#399](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/399) 
- `VOCDetectionDataset`
    - Use bbox\* instead of detection\* for datasets and label\_names (e.g. `VOCDetectionDataset` -> `VOCBboxDataset`. The examples for SSD and Faster R-CNN no longer work with the previous versions) [\#419](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/419) 
- `vis_label`
    - Change function name: `vis_label` -\> `vis_semantic_segmentation` [\#420](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/420)
     - Show in legend only classes that appear in an image for `vis_semantic_segmentation` [\#345](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/345) 
- `FasterRCNNVGG16`
    - Organization of weights for Faster R-CNN has changed. The weights trained by the previous version of ChainerCV can not be loaded to the new model.[\#265](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/265)
- Set train=False in predict [\#407](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/407) 


**New Features**
- Add ADE20K dataset [\#429](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/429)
- Add tile\_images [\#422](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/422) 
- Add Cityscapes semantic segmentation dataset [\#392](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/392)
- Add FeaturePredictor [\#383](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/383) 
- Add Conv2DBNActiv [\#390](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/390) 
- Add Conv2DActiv [\#384](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/384) 
- Add ImageFolderDataset (Renamed to DirectoryParsingLabelDataset later) [\#271](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/271)
- Add write\_image [\#377](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/377) 
- Add sequential\_feature\_extractor (Renamed to PickableSequentialChain later) [\#342](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/342)
- Add VGG16 [\#265](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/265)

**Enhancements and Bug Fixes**

- 3.0.0b1 -\> 3.0.0rc1 [\#442](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/442) 
- Fix doc of bbox2loc and loc2bbox [\#439](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/439) 
- Refactor faster\_rcnn.predict [\#438](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/438) (@knorth55 thanks!)
- Change variable names for Cityscapes to be specific to semantic segmentation [\#437](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/437) 
- Use old conda version to make travis work again [\#431](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/431) 
- Change SentialFeatureExtractor to PickableSequentialChain [\#427](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/427) 
- fix a typo in assert\_is\_semantic\_segmentation\_dataset [\#424](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/424) 
- Fix doc of semantic segmentation datasets to not use "task" [\#423](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/423) 
- Make a directory for chainercv.utils.image [\#421](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/421) 
- Raise helpful warnings with Faster R-CNN train script [\#418](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/418) 
- Fix README for VGG [\#414](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/414) 
- Add interpolation options to scale [\#412](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/412) (@akitotakeki thanks!)
- n\_class before pretrained\_model [\#408](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/408) 
- Use LabelDataset naming convention [\#405](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/405) 
- Fix resize\_contain with odd margin [\#404](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/404) 
- Remove cityscapes\_labels [\#403](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/403) 
- Change default nobias option for Conv2DBNActiv [\#402](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/402) 
- Change variable names: filenames to paths [\#398](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/398) 
- Fix a typo [\#397](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/397)
- Improve style checker [\#396](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/396) 
- Add style checker [\#393](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/393) 
- use write\_image in tests [\#382](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/382) 
- Remove get\_device [\#381](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/381) (@naoto0804 thanks!)
- Add citation [\#378](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/378)
- Delete ConcatenatedDataset doc [\#374](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/374) 
- Fix a typo in eval\_semantic\_segmentation.py [\#372](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/372)
- Fix use\_gpu in examples [\#371](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/371) 
- Support Chainer 2.0.1 and 3.0.0a1 [\#370](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/370) (@kkk669 thanks!)
- update to Chainer v3.0.0b1 [\#369](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/369) 
- Add training result of SSD512 [\#366](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/366) 
- Stop PixelwiseSoftmaxClassifier from requring n\_class  [\#364](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/364) 
- Remove matplotlib backend specification line from example code [\#355](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/355) 
- Fix Chainer version in Travis [\#351](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/351) 
- Add Faster R-CNN VOC07+12 experiment [\#350](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/350) 
- Sequential feature extractor remove\_unused [\#348](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/348) 
- Fix SequentialFeatureExtractor doc to properly compile [\#347](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/347) 
- Add all\_feature\_names to SequentialFeatureExtractor [\#343](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/343) 
- Stop using invoke\_before\_training option in Faster R-CNN example [\#340](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/340) 
- Fix ConcatenatedDataset [\#339](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/339) 
- use init\_scope in examples/ssd/train.py [\#337](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/337) 
- Add numpy installation to docs [\#336](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/336)

name: v0.6.0
body:
**Annoncements**
ChainerCV changed CI to test both on Chainer v2 and Chainer v3 (alpha).
Since there are users that use development version and stable version of Chainer, ChainerCV will try to support both versions of Chainer as much as possible.
The priority is on stable version of Chainer, and ChainerCV will be made sure to always work on the stable version.
The development version will be supported while it is possible to support the two versions simultaneously. This means that CI tests will run with the development version and the stable version.
In ChainerCV, new features added to Chainer will not be used. If a new feature is necessary, the relevant part can be copied to ChainerCV temporarily. In this case, the code will be deleted once the development version is released.

**Major Improvements**
- Add training code of SSD [\#206](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/206)

**API Change**

- Add training code of SSD [\#206](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/206)
- Change eval\_detection\_voc\_ap to eval\_detection\_voc [\#277](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/277)
- Delete eval\_pck [\#276](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/276)
- Change eval\_semantic\_segmentation\_iou to eval\_semantic\_segmentation [\#275](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/275)
- Directory structure of `extensions` has changed #238

**New features**
- Add SemanticSegmentationEvaluator [\#238](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/238)
- Add download\_model [\#260](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/260)
- Add crop\_bbox [\#291](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/291)

**Implemented enhancements:**
- Improve setup.py to work on a machine without numpy or cython [\#327](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/327)
- Import cupy as cp [\#316](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/316)
- Stop raising a warning when resize is not used [\#307](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/307)
- Support \(C, 1, 1\) for fill argument [\#306](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/306)
- Add version to chainercv.\_\_init\_\_.py [\#301](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/301)
- Improve caffe2npz in example/ssd [\#263](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/263)
- Improve CubDataset [\#259](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/259)
- Add cub\_label\_names [\#253](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/253)
- Redirect to doc on stable version from README [\#302](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/302)
- Notify users about evaluation code [\#299](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/299)
- bottom left, top right -\> top left, bottom right [\#294](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/294)
- Show dialog before download [\#287](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/287)
- Add tests for VOCDetectionDataset [\#177](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/177)
- Add assert\_is\_\*\_link [\#285](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/285)
- Add assertions [\#278](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/278)
- Mark TransformDataset as deprecated (#335)
- remove ConcatenatedDataset (#331)
- Travis CI for development version (#330)


**Fixed bugs:**
- Fix a bug in Faster R-CNN [\#266](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/266)
- fix zero division [\#322](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/322)
- Fix clip in Faster RCNN's predict [\#319](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/319)
- Stop declaring transform inside main [\#311](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/311)
- Use autoclass for datasets doc [\#308](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/308)
- Fix test\_assert\_is\_detection\_link to always raise assert error [\#304](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/304)
- Update documentation version [\#288](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/288)
- prevent duration = 0.0 and divding by zero [\#284](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/284)  (@sitifukujin thanks!)
- Fix a typo in the yml files. [\#282](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/282) (@zori thanks!)
- Fix error message for ten\_crop [\#280](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/280)
- Fix a bug in scale [\#279](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/279)
- Fix pip version in README [\#270](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/270)
- ChainerV2 calls trigger outside of snapshot object [\#272](https://github.com/chainer/chainercv/pull/272)  (@MannyKayy thanks!)

name: Bug fix release
body:
This release fixes a bug found in Faster R-CNN model (#266).

Full list of features added during v0.5 development will be summarized in v0.6 release note.

name: Bug fix release for Chianer v1 branch
body:
This release fixes a bug found in Faster R-CNN model (#266).
No new feature is added.

name: The first Chainer v2 release
body:
This is the first release that supports Chainer v2.
For Chainer v1 users, please use the latest version in version 0.4.*.

## Changes
+ Migrate to Chainer v2 (#243)

name: Last version for Chainer v1
body:
This is the last version with new features for Chainer v1.
The v0.4* will be updated when there is a critical bug that needs to be fixed.
For users using Chainer v2, please use versions v0.5.0 and higher.

## Changed API

**Important** Axis-dependent values follow row-column order instead of column-row order.
+ Convert convention used to describe shape of images from WH to HW (#234)
+ Coordinates of bounding boxes are ordered as `(y_min, x_min, y_max, x_max)` instead of `(x_min, y_min, x_max, y_max)`. (#246)
+ Coordinates of keypoints are ordered as `(y, x)`. (#235)
+ Order of keyword arguments such as `x_flip, y_flip` for `transforms/image` are swapped. (#236)

Other changes
+ Changed interface for `eval_semantic_segmentation`. They are now `eval_semantic_segmentation_iou` (#215,  #217).
+ Changed name of `eval_detection_voc` to `eval_detection_voc_ap`. (#232)

## New features
+ `add_apply_prediction_to_iterator` is added. (#229)
+ Add `generate_random_bbox` (#219)

## Enhancement
+ `DetectionVocEvaluator` can now report AP for each class. (#242)
+ Use `DetectionVocEvaluator` inside the train code for Faster R-CNN. (#213)
+ Accept pretrained_model path for demos (#218)
+ Add pretrained option to `eval_voc07` (#231)


## Bug fixes
+ Fix the range of label in `test_faster_rcnn_train_chain`  (#212)
+ Fix readthedoc to compile properly by installing Cython (#214)
+ Fix case of package names (#216)
+ Fix requirements.txt for docs (#221)
+ Add links.rst  (#223)
+ Fix SegNet example's evaluation protocol (#249, #255)
+ Fix `eval_voc_07` (#239)
